rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医院废水富含抗生素抗性基因，存在感染风险英国和爱尔兰共和国的研究人员在一家大型教学医院的废水系统中发现了高水平的抗生素抗性基因。研究结果强调，迫切需要定期净化和采取更严格的感染控制措施来保护患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Hospital-wastewater-teeming-with-antibiotic-pressive-genes-poses-infection-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Hospital-wastewater-teeming-with-antibiotic-pressive-genes-poses-infection-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54033cb3-9cef-4d04-bd6e-b98bf36343b1 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 00:08:00 -0400 Hospital wastewater teeming with antibiotic-resistant genes, poses infection risk
新型植入装置携带产生胰岛素的胰岛细胞来控制糖尿病治疗 1 型糖尿病的一种有前途的方法是植入可以在需要时产生胰岛素的胰岛细胞，这可以使患者免于频繁注射胰岛素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-implantable-device-carries-insulin-having-islet-cells-to-control-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-implantable-device-carries-insulin-having-islet-cells-to-control-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33afab79-d86e-41b4-896e-e40fe480b6e4 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 00:03:58 -0400 New implantable device carries insulin-producing islet cells to control diabetes
宝宝的肠道细菌可以预测食物过敏吗？意大利的研究人员深入研究了生命最初 1000 天内肠道微生物群的变化如何影响儿童食物过敏的发生。该研究揭示了影响肠道健康的各种因素，例如分娩方式、母乳喂养和抗生素使用，强调需要对预防过敏的有效干预措施进行更多研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Can-your-babys-gut-bacteria-predict-food-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Can-your-babys-gut-bacteria-predict-food-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c13ceba-abaa-4f79-b754-7a5766e608eb Mon, 18 Sep 2023 23:40:00 -0400 Can your baby's gut bacteria predict food allergies?
Facebook 对抗疫苗错误信息的斗争失败了吗？研究人员发现，Facebook 消除 COVID-19 疫苗错误信息的政策部分无效，因为用户对反疫苗内容的参与度并未减少。研究表明，该平台的系统架构允许用户绕过错误信息遏制政策，从而使有效遏制传播变得具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Is-Facebooks-fight-against-vaccine-misinformation-failing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Is-Facebooks-fight-against-vaccine-misinformation-failing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ed08c9e-f751-4aac-8e12-3c1e3b9d0dfc Mon, 18 Sep 2023 23:21:00 -0400 Is Facebook's fight against vaccine misinformation failing?
Uniink：一种治疗 1 型糖尿病的新型 3D 生物打印细胞疗法Javier Ramón Azcón 是 ICREA 研究教授，也是加泰罗尼亚生物工程研究所 (IBEC) 生物工程生物传感器小组的负责人，已获得“ERC 概念验证补助金”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Uniink-A-new-3D-bioprinted-cell-therapy-approach-for-Type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Uniink-A-new-3D-bioprinted-cell-therapy-approach-for-Type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a51bc69-b308-4ae2-a8e6-811b807cadd0 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 23:09:05 -0400 Uniink: A new 3D bioprinted cell therapy approach for Type 1 diabetes
解锁秘密士兵：树突状细胞如何彻底改变癌症免疫疗法《免疫》杂志最近发表的一篇评论深入探讨了树突状细胞 (DC) 在塑造癌症 T 细胞反应中的关键作用，强调了它们在启动抗肿瘤免疫和肿瘤内持续免疫相互作用中的重要性。这些发现强调了树突状细胞作为下一代癌症免疫疗法关键靶点的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Unlocking-the-secret-soldiers-How-dendritic-cells-could-revolutionize-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Unlocking-the-secret-soldiers-How-dendritic-cells-could-revolutionize-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ba46eb5-8029-43f9-b165-d9fcda792ee4 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 22:59:00 -0400 Unlocking the secret soldiers: How dendritic cells could revolutionize cancer immunotherapy
研究人员确定了未来治疗遗传性失明的关键机制CERKL基因导致视网膜色素变性和其他遗传性视力疾病的作用机制仍然存在许多谜团。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-to-address-future-treatments-for-hereditary-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-to-address-future-treatments-for-hereditary-blindness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94a2d783-b77b-46b7-9103-595957cd3b11 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 22:56:00 -0400 Researchers identify key mechanisms to address future treatments for hereditary blindness
研究强调了一种有前途的治疗方法，可以减轻太空飞行引起的骨质流失发表在《Nature》合作期刊《npj Microgravity》上的一项新研究发现，给国际空间站 (ISS) 上的老鼠服用一种工程化合物，可以在很大程度上防止与太空停留时间相关的骨质流失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Study-highlights-a-promising-therapy-to-mitigate-spaceflight-induced-bone-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Study-highlights-a-promising-therapy-to-mitigate-spaceflight-induced-bone-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3bcc5f-7890-4203-9ba6-893bf8eb4de3 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 22:49:00 -0400 Study highlights a promising therapy to mitigate spaceflight-induced bone loss
新的免疫调节蛋白与自身免疫性疾病有关自身免疫性疾病是一种复杂的疾病，其原因多种多样，且尚未得到充分解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/New-immunoreregulatory- Protein-linked-to-autoimmune-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/New-immunoreregulatory- Protein-linked-to-autoimmune-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3792a88-ec4b-44d6-8267-2dd33a74250a Mon, 18 Sep 2023 22:47:00 -0400 New immunoregulatory protein linked to autoimmune disease
卫生工作者警告说，在医院放松口罩的建议会伤害患者和医疗服务提供者护士、研究人员和工作场所安全官员担心，疾病控制和预防中心的新指南可能会降低医院对冠状病毒和其他空气传播病原体的防护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Health-workers-warn-loosening-mask-advice-in-hospitals-would-harm-病人-and-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Health-workers-warn-loosening-mask-advice-in-hospitals-would-harm-病人-and-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aef14d40-2918-4eb2-b5aa-dd93047dd766 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 22:23:10 -0400 Health workers warn loosening mask advice in hospitals would harm patients and providers
